org.pikater.web.vaadin

Class UserSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pikater.web.vaadin.UserSession

  • public class UserSession
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class that manages all attributes the application stores in user sessions. Do note, however, that it is not a "session implementation". On the contrary, the session in question is always required as a method argument.
    Author:
    SkyCrawl

      • rememberSharedResource

        public static void rememberSharedResource(com.vaadin.server.VaadinSession session,
                          java.util.UUID resourceID)

        All shared resources registered with ResourceRegistrar and ResourceExpiration#ON_SESSION_END are also required to be stored in the user's session for eventual cleanup.

        Other resources may be stored too.

        Parameters:
        session - user's session
        resourceID - the identifier assigned to the given resource by ResourceRegistrar

      • getSharedResources

        public static java.util.Set<java.util.UUID> getSharedResources(com.vaadin.server.VaadinSession session)
        Returns all identifiers stored by rememberSharedResource(VaadinSession, UUID) method.
        Parameters:
        session - user's session
